pages.text: To get Shockmetal ingots the first step is to craft an Ore Grinder. This will allow the blending of ingredients to form ore blends.
Netherite can be crushed into it's dust form by crafting an ingot with the ore grinder. The dust can also be smelted back into its ingot form.
By combining Shockmetal ore with netherite, you get shockrite dust which can be smelted into Shockmetal ingots.
Shockmetal ingots can be smelted from either shockrite or shockmetal dust.
Shockmetal ingots can be crushed into shockmetal dust which can be used in other crafting recipes.
